CV/192c.title: Underwriting
CV/192c.content:
A solo maintainer of a CRM backend microservice within a credit department.
Implemented features of manual stage of credit department journey. Implemented unit- and functional tests.
Watchman activity: checked production errors, introduced fixes or follow-up tasks. Customized Newrelic to have relevant alerts.
Stack:

Kotlin, Spark
Postgress, SQL, JOOQ, Flyway
JUnit, Mockito, Wiremock, Docker+testcontainers
Grafana, GCP, Gradle, Teamcity, git
An in-house alternative of Kafka

Architecture / patterns / mechanisms:

modular microservice, DDD (bounded context, ubiquitous language)
Layered architecture, CQRS, pessimistick locking
Idempotency, strategy, permission check, status transitions, decorator, factory, VO, DTO, manual DI and configuration (no spring)

CV/8575.content:
2021-06-01 ‚Äì 2022-09-30
Full time
Kotlin developer
Project: Underwriting

Revolut is a London-headquartered financial technology company that offers banking services allowing customers to transfer money to over 50 countries using more than 30 currencies. The Credit Underwriting platform assesses credit applications from all over the world to decide whether or not Revolut company is ready issue a loan.

CV/a060.title: REHA.Complete
CV/a060.content:
Role: Senior backend Java developer
A CRM printing functionality developer within a 800 database table- 25-people team and 8-years legacy monolith project.
Stack:

Java 8
PDFBox, Jasper Reports (Embedded + Standalone)
Spring (IoC; REST), Apache Tomcat, JDBC, MapStruct, DozerMapper, Jackson Mapper, Apache Camel
JPA: Hibernate, SQL, Oracle Database, Liquibase
JUnit, Mockito, Spring Test
JProfiler
svn, git, Maven, GitLab, Jenkins

Architecture / patterns / mechanisms:


bus, templates, status transitions, pessimistick locking


Implemented backend and frontend document PDF printing functionality.


115 features implemented. 492 bugs fixed.


Participated in the team of 14 devs, 3 automation QA, 6 manual QA, a UX engineer. A sub-team I worked in: test engineer, architect, team lead, 2 developers.


Processed several code review requests on the daily basis.


Wrote technical patch notes describing my implementation.


Provided unit-test coverage for the implemented functionality.


Conducted the 30-hour java core introduction for automation QA.


Mentored students through the Deutsche Telekom IT Solutions Java school ‚Äò18 and ‚Äò19.


The web CRM for Austrian government rehabilitation healthcare organization. The application handles the entire lifecycle of clinical orders, vital signs management, printing reports, diagnoses management, and other aspects of clinic operations.

heap/8268.title: Templater
heap/8268.content:
Generate Obsidian templater code so that newly created file are moved to a subfolder named with a BASE-16 randomly generated filename of length = 4.

The script should perform as many tries as needed to find unoccupied filename.

.md file should have the same name as the folder it belongs to.

aliases section should contain the initial file name.

The first header should be the same as the initial filename.

If all the attempts are failed, add warning to log and increment max length by 1.

how many permutations do I need in my unique ids?
0000-9999
aaaa-zzzz
0000-zzzz
10+26
4
nPr = 36P4
nPr calculator
